name: Mocking Dance
text: You do a little dance that mocks your foe and entertains the crowd.
benefit: When you spend a swift action to make a performance combat check, before making that check you can either move 5 feet without provoking attacks of opportunity, or you can move your speed and provoke attacks of opportunity. You cannot end this move in a space where you threaten an enemy. If you do move at least 5 feet, you gain a +2 bonus on the performance combat check.
staminaText: When using this feat, you can spend 5 stamina points to move up to half your speed (instead of only 5 feet) without provoking attacks of opportunity.
text_zh: 你跳了一小段滑稽舞来挑衅对手并娱乐大众。
benefit_zh: 当你以迅捷动作进行演武检定时，你可以在检定前不受借机攻击移动5尺，或以正常速度移动并引发借机攻击。你不能停在可以威胁到对手的地方。若你至少移动了5尺，你的演武检定+2。
staminaText_zh: 当你使用这个专长时，你可以消耗5点耐力来移动至多你一半的速度（而不是只能5尺）而不会引发借机攻击。
